resources.string: PTI: Primary Training Institute PTI for short. One and a half year long DPED training is imparted in PTIs to enhance the professional skills of government primary school teachers and improve the quality of primary education. At present, the total number of PTIs in the country is 67. There are 2 private PTIs in it. Pirojpur PTI is a traditional organization for the development of professional skills and quality of teachers of government primary schools in Pirojpur district. It was established in 1966.

1) Diploma in Primary Education (DPEd)
 2) ICT in Primary Education
 3) Math Olympiad for Primary Education
 4) Need Based Sub Cluster Training
 5) Subject Based Training
 6) Digital Smart Classroom Training
1) Online DPEd Training\n 2) Online ICT Training\n 3) Online Subject Based Training
1) New Notice: DPED 2019-2020 Final result has been published.\n 2) DPED Online Class is running.\n 3) Online ICT Training is running.
